alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 18 at 3:48AM ChST until January 18 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Guam. * WHEN...Until 6 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The intense high pressure ridge behind the descending shear line will maintain windy conditions through this afternoon. Very high elevations could briefly experience sustained winds of 40 mph. Conditions may improve thereafter, but winds will remain elevated through the weekend.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
